summary: The Delinking Revenue from Unfair Gouging Act (DRUG Act) aims to reform pharmacy benefit managers (PBMs). It prohibits PBMs from receiving remuneration from entities related to prescription drug benefits, with exceptions for bona fide service fees. The bill modifies the Public Health Service Act, ERISA, and the Internal Revenue Code to enforce these provisions, including penalties and disgorgement of ill-gotten gains. It mandates the implementation through interim final regulations.
